item.title: Building a Q&A app capable of answering questions related to your enterprise documents using Azure OpenAI's GPT-4, Pinecone and Streamlit.
item.description: The purpose of this post is to show you how to build a basic GPT-4 Q&A app in just a couple of hours that is capable of answering questions about your company's internal documents. We will use Azure OpenAI, Pinecone and Streamlit to build it.
